Row.Text: Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} seems like a good step for the both of us. Thanks.

Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} will be a great benefit to the Palace of Earth Spirits. I tried my hand at politics, but apparently "Make Everyone Love Satori Komeiji" isn't a resolution they let you pass.
Do you think the {1_LeagueName} can stop me from ushering in nuclear annihilation? Do you think ANYTHING in your surface world can stop me?
If you are counting on the laws of the {1_LeagueName} to keep me in check, you should know that no force on Earth or in Hell will ever hold me back!
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} passed because of your support! I'm not being modest. My delegates got drunk and passed out during the voting.
Thank you for supporting my proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. I'm not very good at politics.
Your delegation blocked my proposal to the {1_LeagueName}? I see how it is.
Stonewalling me in the {1_LeagueName}? Well, uh, you... I... Oh! [NEWLINE] Stone walls won't protect you from my nuclear fury!
Thanks for voting us to host the next World Congress. The {1_LeagueName} may be hosted in a Blazing Hell, but, you know, there's nice things about it too.
This "archaeology" has to stop. My people live underground, okay? You are not digging up ancient ruins, you are digging into our living rooms.
No! Why should you care, you don't live underground, you didn't even know that stuff was in there!
Fine, fine, we'll stop digging. You don't really have any habitable holes anyway.
You apparently aren't taking this seriously. One of your professors dug into Yuugi Hoshiguma's sake cellar -- he's lucky he still has skin!
THANK you! If I had to hear Parsee whining about professors digging into her home with way better clothes than she has one more time, I was going to smash my face in with my own control rod.

The oni are rioting in the streets! And it's Wednesday, which means they should still be sleeping off the last riot! Don't you come in here and agitate my people with your "freedom" talk, they are agitated enough!
Why did I just have to spend two hours telling Satori's pet shoebill that I'm not exploiting her labor? This is all your fault, you and your agents of Order!

My people are looking at your Autocracy and demanding a powerful leader to rally behind and take care of all their problems. I want you to remember this. When I scourge the surface world clean in a storm of nuclear hellfire in order to secure the future of my people, it'll be your fault.

Satori will never be happy until the world embraces Freedom, and she's free to find all the people who will embrace her and forge her own path in life! I'm sure it will be better for your people too, but I don't care about them as much.

Satori will never be happy until the world embraces Order, and she's finally safe from all the youkai and surface-worlders who want to hurt or exploit her! I bet your people would appreciate being safe too, but that's not really what I'm here for.
Satori will never be happy unless we take the world in an iron grip and FORCE it to welcome her! I'm sure you have some people you want the world to accomodate too, they'll probably appreciate it.
Good, you accepted the path of Freedom! I bet Satori will be happier now that she knows the world is becoming a freer place. I bet.
At last, you accepted the path of Order! Now we are one step closer to a world where Satori doesn't have to be afraid any more. That was why you did it, right?
Good, you've joined me on the path of Autocracy! Together, we can bend this world to our will and create a society where Satori can feel as loved as she deserves!

My people are now listening to your pop music and wearing your blue jeans. Which is fine, I guess, but could you start making jeans with a drawstring or something? It's hard to work that button and zipper when one of your hands is a control rod.

I'm glad to see your people embracing the culture of the underground! You would think that our pop music would get old since it's all remixes of the same song, but Solar Sect of Mysic Wisdom ~ Nuclear Fusion just rocks THAT HARD.
